Name: Curves
About the game: Just relaxing and chilling Wholesome and beautiful. This is not a game. This is art. -Anonymous 'Curves' is inspired by the winter sports skeleton. Try to make the difference in milliseconds on the track. Physics-based hoverboard. -It moves smoothly along the terrain. Physics-based character. -A physical animation that is transformed by movement. Track. -Various tracks have been prepared, and will be added in the future. Can get out of track. -Out of the track, the game doesn't end. Take a breath for a while. Day and night. -Curves Island has day and night. Sunrise and sunset will be a joy. Record Competition. -You can compete with users around the world. Costumes. -Various kinds of costumes can be acquired in the game.
